          <title>
            <string language="sl">Fužinarstvo in rudarstvo - križanka</string>
            <string language="en">Ironworks and mining - crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisenarbeiten und Bergbau - Kreuzworträtsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Usines sidérurgiques et extraction - mots croisé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ironworks e minar - crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ironworks ed estrarre - parole incrociate</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Ironworks y el minar - crucigrama</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Križanka sestavljena iz besed povezanih z fužinarstvom in rudarstvom.</string>
            <string language="en">Crossword puzzle build of terms related to the ironworks and mining.</string>
          </description>

den Eisenarbeiten und dem Bergbau in Verbindung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La construction de jeu de mots croisé des limites
a associé aux usines sidérurgiques et à l'extraction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A configuração do enigma de crossword dos termos
relacionou-se aos ironworks e a minar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La configurazione di cruciverba dei termini si è 
riferita ai ironworks e ad estrarre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευή γρίφων σταυρόλεξων των όρων σχετικών με τα 
σιδηρουργεία και τη μεταλλεία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura del crucigrama de términos se 
relacionó con los ironworks y minar.</string>
          </description>
